meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jesse Cuevas Laura Spadanuta Pam Jones-Pigott Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6007.

td.p: Jesse Cuevas, a corporate lawyer originally from Leawood, Kansas
Laura Spadanuta, a trade magazine reporter and editor originally from Floral Park, New York
Pam Jones-Pigott, a farmers' market coordinator from Pflugerville, Texas (whose 1-day cash winnings total $16,800)

tr.td: 19th CENTURY INVENTIONS
LIVE LONG & PROSPER
I'M HENRY VIII, I AM
CHARLIE
THE UNICORN
"TION" THE NONBELIEVERS

')

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: Now over to Jesse Cuevas, his response was...what? Who is R. Lavar, or Laver, we don\'t penalize you for misspelled words. [*], Rod the Rocket, you\'re right.)
LauraWho is Lleyton Hewitt
$11,800
JesseWho is R. Lavar
$8,800
Rod Laver')

Laura
